channel.title: So i'm on the National Leaderboard Ranking For Poker. UPDATED
channel.description:
Yea.. Just wanted to share this.. Ive been playing Poker for "Champions league pub poker" for 1-2 years.. Theres 4 seasons a year each lasting 13 weeks.. 10 weeks into this season and ive been ranked 1st throughout out of 5000 people (increasing every day).
3 weeks left and ive been playing not as good at my other venue as i am at my second venue.
http://www.championspoker.co.uk
im Steven Franklin. By the way lol.
Don't really know what i get if i come 1st.. Going down to Birmingham on the 18th to support my mates that are in the national final (i had a bad beat in the regional so i didn't get in :("
Ill keep this updated until the league term finishes.. I'm next playing tomorrow at my secondary venue where i have won 6 out of 9 and come second twice.

item.title: So i'm on the National Leaderboard Ranking For Poker. UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @etsija0 etsija0
item.description:
@etsija0 wrote:

Good gaming…Are you still up for this year? I bet they have an [COLOR=#000000]online casino[/COLOR] site of their own. I just want to know if they’re in for the next year?

Read full topic
item.source: So i'm on the National Leaderboard Ranking For Poker. UPDATED

item.title: So i'm on the National Leaderboard Ranking For Poker. UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

did shit tonight… only 4 of us turned up and only 2 wanted to play for money… so we didnt actually play for money so everyone played silly…

Got taken out

i had 10/3 (normally i wouldnt call the bb with this hand lmao) and the flop came 10 Q 10… a guy raises 2k and i thought that was a steep raise the guy to the right of me took about 5 min to think and eventually folded. i went all in for another 3k more and he instantly calls… Yea… he had A10… You dont expect all 10’s to be out when theres only 3 people in the round.

So ya weird thing is i was actually thinkin about folding and was more thoughtful about folding

UPDATE

Still 1st.

Had a game at my mates tonight.

£2.50 rebuys

after 6 hours i spent £2.50 on an add on (after the break) and was chip leader throughout… Came 1st and came away with £55 after all the food and taxi home. not a bad night

Read full topic
